headline: Bank of America delivers sobering stock market take
summary: Bank of America feels stock market investors have gotten a little too comfortable. After this week’s Fed rate decision left policy unchanged (as expected), the big bank’s leading equity strategist warned that AI-driven optimism is essentially leaving the rest of the market mispriced and dangerously ...

headline: Bank of America Sees Earnings Upside at Goldman Sachs (GS) into 2026
summary: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (NYSE:GS) is included among the 12 Best Dow Jones Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. headline: Options Alert: BAC Long Straddle Trade Idea
summary: Volatility is back towards the lowest levels we have seen in 2025 with the VIX Index closing at 16.35 on Wednesday. When volatility is low, options become cheaper.

headline: World’s largest sovereign wealth fund made $247 billion in 2025, driven by tech and banking rally
summary: Norway's $2 trillion sovereign wealth fund holds stakes in many of the world's biggest companies, including Apple, Nvidia and JPMorgan Chase.

headline: More Layoffs Are Coming at Citigroup in March. What Does That Mean for C Stock and Its 2% Dividend?
summary: Citigroup's March layoffs are part of a 20,000‑job reduction plan running through the end of 2026, with roughly 1,000 roles already eliminated in January as CEO Jane Fraser tightens costs and restructures the bank under a multi‑year overhaul.
